prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the forest with vibrant colors and striking features.
Imagine a Pokemon that can manipulate electricity, showcasing bold yellow and black hues.
Show me a Pokemon that has a unique bird-like appearance with elements of thunder and nature.
Generate a legendary Pokemon that lives in tropical environments and has a playful yet fierce demeanor.
Design a creature that has a mix of electric and fairy traits, with stunning visual contrasts.
Give me a Pokemon that combines agility and strength, featuring bright orange and black colors.
Make a Pokemon that can soar through the skies and is known for its protective nature.

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Fast and agile with high mobility
